org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util

Class ExponentialMovingAverage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.MovingAverage
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.WindowMovingAverage
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.ExponentialMovingAverage

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ExponentialMovingAverage
extends WindowMovingAverage
    EMA is similar to WeightedMovingAverage in weighted, but the weighting factor decrease exponentially. It brings benefits that it is more sensitive, and can see the trends easily.
